data.message: GIRL DIED IN 1993. The murderer chanted, "Toma sota balcu" as he buried her. Now that you have read the chant, you will meet this little girl. In the middle of the... night she will stand at the side of your bed starring straight into your eyes. She wil suffocate you... like she was suffocated. This story is sadly true If you post this 5 differnt events she will not bother u if u copy and paste this to ten events in the next ten minutes u will have the best day of ur life tomorrow. u will either get kissed or asked out, if u break this chain u will see a little dead girl in your room tonight. in 53 mins someone will say i love you or im sorry or i wanna go out
